meanings.definition: relating to or characteristic of acrobats or their performances
meanings.sent1: The circus performer's acrobatic moves amazed the audience.
meanings.sent2: The acrobatic show featured daring stunts and flips.
meanings.sent3: The acrobatic cat leaped gracefully from one chair to another.
meanings.sent4: Her acrobatic ability on the balance beam was like watching a skilled dancer.
meanings.sent5: The acrobatic display left a lasting impression on everyone who watched.

meanings.sent1: The acrobatic routine at the talent show was a crowd favorite.
meanings.sent2: She practiced her acrobatic skills every day to improve.
meanings.sent3: The acrobatic squirrel leaped from tree to tree with ease.
meanings.sent4: His acrobatic performance on the parallel bars was flawless.
meanings.sent5: The acrobatic display at the park drew a large audience.

meanings.sent1: The acrobatic gymnast twisted and turned in mid-air.
meanings.sent2: The acrobatic dancer moved with grace and precision.
meanings.sent3: The acrobatic monkey swung effortlessly from branch to branch.
meanings.sent4: Her acrobatic reflexes saved her from falling off the tightrope.
meanings.sent5: The acrobatic performance was a testament to years of dedicated practice.
